member.name: M:DJDB.DJDBTreeView.cropAlarmAnalystConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Crops the values for the AlarmAnalyst XML Config file. You need to check Group, DataSet, Station and Sensor that you want to add to the list.

member.name: M:DJDB.frmExportToStatistics.lblExportStatistics_LinkClicked(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs)
member.summary:
Config File Name:
key 'FORMAT': -> SINGLE_DS_EXPORT for simple export of some stations from a single ds to a column organized textfile -> COLUMN export from several datasets and several stations to a column organized textfile -> LINE export from several datasets and several stations to a line organized textfile
example: -- FORMAT SINGLE_DS_EXPORT NUMERICFORMAT 0.000 DATASET RESULTS lassoula horaire new STATION Lassoula1_SM|5 Qs Serie STATION Lassoula2_SM|5 Qs Serie --
